title: Democratic debate 2019: Live analysis from Ohio
text:
Good evening from Ohio! Tonight, I’m looking to see how Bernie Sanders bounces back after suffering a heart attack two weeks ago. He’s been off the campaign trail since then, but Sanders and his aides say he’s feeling great — and that his performance on the stage will show his vitality.

A HuffPost/YouGov poll found that 59 percent of registered voters said Sanders’ physical condition is not good enough. That means a lot is riding on this debate. But what’s good for Sanders is that he has relatively low expectations — 12 percent of Democratic primary voters said they expected him to perform the best of any candidate, according to a poll by POLITICO/Morning Consult — making it theoretically easier for him to surpass expectations.
description: Get real-time analysis from our 2020 team as you watch the fourth Democratic Debate in Ohio.
